snippet.title: The Last Oricru - Gamescom 2022
snippet.description:
The Last Oricru is a story-driven action RPG, that puts you in the middle of an ongoing conflict between two races, on a partly terraformed planet, isolated from outer space by a protective barrier. 

You will fight alone or (splitscreen offline/ online) coop with different difficulty settings to choose from. 

You will experience hundreds of intense fights in a brutal medieval meets sci-fi world, where every decision has its consequences. 

Your decisions will bring interesting twists into the gameplay, as you can heavily influence the conflict and its outcome. 

Level up your hero, improve your skills before facing one of many boss fights and get ready for an unprecedented amount of possibilities. 

Your choice matters.

----------------------- 
WEBSITE: https://lastoricru.com/ 
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/oricru 
FACEBOOK: https://facebook.com/thelastoricru/ STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1663640/The_Last_Oricru/

#TheLastOricru #PrimeMatter #GoldKnights
